project.name: GemBooth
project.description: AI-powered photo booth with Google Gemini API

important_reminders: Always test Stripe webhooks after deployment changes
Monitor Edge Function logs for Gemini API errors
Check usage limits before adding new features
Remember to set Supabase secrets for production
Update RLS policies when adding new tables
deployment_checklist: Run npm run build locally first
